link.title: ACYR - Phoenix At-Risk Youth Programs | Arizona Center For Youth Resources

meta.name: description
meta.content: For over 40 years, we have been providing Phoenix youth with the resources they need to become successful adults who are both educated and employed. If this outcome interests you, fill out our interest form to learn more about our academic, vocational, and employment programs!
ACYR - Phoenix At-Risk Youth Programs | Arizona Center For Youth Resources

For over 40 years, we have been providing Phoenix youth with the resources they need to become successful adults who are both educated and employed. If this outcome interests you, fill out our interest form to learn more about our academic, vocational, and employment programs!
ACYR - Arizona Center For Youth Resources

vc_col-sm-12 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col no-extra-padding

p.span: Now offering City View High School, GED classes, and workshops online.

ACYR offers an array of high quality programs designed to ensure success – continuing education choices, work-based learning, leadership development, linkages to employers, and on-going, sustained support.
Donations given by April 15th, 2020 can be deducted from your 2019 tax return!

Important Message

In accordance with the AZ Department of Ed and prevention of spreading COVID-19 (Coronavirus), Arizona Center for Youth Resources and City View High School is closed to students the rest of the school year. City View and GED students will be able to complete work via Google Classroom. City View NOW students can complete their coursework normally. For more information, please click on the links for English and Spanish.

School Closure Letter English Link

School Closure Letter Spanish Link

","customEvent":"0"};

div.class: vc_col-sm-12 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col no-extra-padding
wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_row vc_row-o-equal-height vc_row-flex vc_row-o-content-middle standard_section
vc_col-sm-12 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col no-extra-padding

div.p: ACYR helps build pathways to success through education, skill building and employment.

For over 40 years, we have been providing Phoenix youth with the resources they need to become successful adults who are both educated and employed. If this outcome interests you, please fill out our interest form today to find out more about our academic, vocational, and employment programs!

div.class: vc_col-sm-4 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col centered-text no-extra-padding
vc_col-sm-4 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col centered-text no-extra-padding
vc_col-sm-4 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col centered-text no-extra-padding
vc_col-sm-12 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col no-extra-padding
vc_col-sm-12 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col centered-text no-extra-padding

div.p: ACYR offers an array of high-quality programs designed to ensure success, such as continuing education choices, work-based learning, linkages to employers, and ongoing support.

div.class: wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_row vc_row-o-equal-height vc_row-flex standard_section
vc_col-sm-4 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col centered-text no-extra-padding

div.p: Online Dropout Recovery Classes from City View NOW
Earn credits faster than traditional schools

div.class: vc_col-sm-4 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col centered-text no-extra-padding
vc_col-sm-4 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col centered-text no-extra-padding

div.style: background-image: url(https://acyraz.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/bg1.jpg); background-position: center bottom; background-repeat: no-repeat;

div.class: vc_col-sm-12 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col centered-text padding-7-percent
vc_col-sm-12 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col no-extra-padding

h3.strong: Phoenix, Arizona was rated one of the worst cities in the US for youth not in school or employed.

div.class: vc_col-sm-12 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col centered-text no-extra-padding

div.h5: At-risk youth face barriers daily that prevent them from transitioning into well-adjusted young adults. They may face poverty, family instability, a poor school environment, and much more. The longer these youth go without help, the less likely they are to becomes successful adults. So we invite you to join us to change the statistics and futures of at-risk youth in Phoenix! Learn More

div.class: vc_col-sm-12 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col no-extra-padding
vc_col-sm-12 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col padding-3-percent

p.span: Our commitment to developing the next generation of workers is our top priority. Our focus to ensure our success in serving our community starts with our staff, programs and principles.

div.class: wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_row vc_row-o-equal-height vc_row-flex vc_row-o-content-top standard_section
vc_col-sm-4 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col boxed centered-text no-extra-padding

div.style: background-image: url(https://acyraz.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/bg2.jpg); background-position: center center; background-repeat: no-repeat;

div.class: vc_col-sm-12 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col no-extra-padding
vc_col-sm-12 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col centered-text padding-5-percent

div.p: Every year, ACYR makes a difference in the lives of over 1,500 youth in Phoenix through our programs to earn educational credentials and learn skills to find employment. In 2017, ACYR accomplished the following:

div.class: wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_row vc_row-o-equal-height vc_row-flex vc_row-o-content-middle standard_section
vc_col-sm-2 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col centered-text padding-3-percent
vc_col-sm-10 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col no-extra-padding

h5.strong: Teens and young adults received a diploma, GED, or a post-secondary credential.

vc_col-sm-10 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col no-extra-padding

h5.strong: Youth received job opportunities through internships, direct hire or ACYR skill building.

h5.strong: Young adults enrolled in postsecondary education to further their career goals.

div.div: Average salary of all teachers employed in budget year 2019 $ 38,075
Average salary of all teachers employed in prior year 2018 $ 32,646
Increase in average teacher salary from the prior year 2018 $ 5,429

div.p:
ACYR 649 N. 6th Ave Phoenix, AZ 85003 Phone: 602-252-6721
© 2018 ACYR. All Right Reserved.
Privacy Policy | Donor Policy | Sitemap

p.b: In accordance with the AZ Department of Ed and prevention of spreading COVID-19 (Coronavirus), Arizona Center for Youth Resources and City View High School is closed to students the rest of the school year. City View and GED students will be able to complete work via Google Classroom. City View NOW students can complete their coursework normally. For more information, please click on the links for English and Spanish.
